Note     Making it permanent Apart from that I had to play around with the Advanced Effects settings as kwin's performance seemed to have dropped. If you're lucky your KDE4 will be snappier than ever. If you're unlucky and it stays the same or gets even worse, try experimenting with the value of InitialPixmapPlacement, setting it to 1 or 3. Set the following options: $ nvidia-settings -a InitialPixmapPlacement=2 -a GlyphCache=1 Make sure you the NVIDIA kernel module gets loaded by either rebooting or rmmod/modprobe (Of course you'll also have to restart xorg) Install the latest NVIDIA graphics driver (173.14.09 works fine for me)
